name: Gotta Get The Flag! Game Jam Edition
name_original: Gotta Get The Flag! Game Jam Edition
description:
THiS iS A ViDEOGAME. EVERY TiME YOU 2x JUMP YOU'LL DIE SLOWLY. REPLENISH YOUR HEALTH BY BUYING HEALTH. 
Ok I am A BiG iDIOt. 2 SNAilS ARE FLOAtiNG iN AiR LMAO. NO BUG FIXES ARE ALLOWED SO  😞 

A TO MOVE LEFT, D TO MOVE RIGHT (Or Arrow Keys if u r billy. Frick billy). SPACE TO JUMP /\

"You cannot buy life" - Boomer

"You can buy life in a game"- A fellow Boner
